events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but the package still hasn't arrived and there is no update on the shipping status.
The issue has been identified as a delivery delay based on the customer's report of late shipping and lack of tracking updates.
An agent from the logistics support team has been assigned to assist with the customer's delayed delivery inquiry.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand your order hasn't arrived yet, and I'm here to help resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking information you might have so I can investigate the delay further?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. Unfortunately, the tracking page still shows 'Label created' but no actual shipping movement.
Thank you for the information. I contacted the courier service, and it appears there is a delay in dispatching. We can expedite shipping at no extra cost or issue a full refund if you prefer.
I appreciate the prompt response. Please go ahead and expedite the shipping. I really want to receive the product as soon as possible.
Great! I've processed the expedited shipping request. You should receive a new tracking number shortly, and your package will be prioritized for quicker delivery.
Just checking in to confirm that your package has arrived and that you are satisfied with the resolution we provided.
Yes, the package arrived yesterday. Everything is fine now. Thanks for your help and quick resolution!
We are glad to hear that your order arrived safely. Closing this case now, but feel free to contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
